entry.title: 'The Sandbox' Ethereum Game Valued at $1 Billion With New Funding
entry.summary: Metaverse game The Sandbox is the latest crypto unicorn following a $20 million raise led by parent Animoca Brands alongside Kingsway Capital.

entry.title: European Central Bank Cuts Rates—What It Means for the Fed and Bitcoin
entry.summary: Analysts believe the Fed won’t lower interest rates until later this year, with inflation proving more stubborn in the United States than in Europe.

entry.title: Stablecoin Giant Tether Now Owns 25% of Bitcoin Miner Bitdeer
entry.summary: Tether, the firm behind USDT, now owns 25% of Bitcoin miner Bitdeer's shares according to a new SEC filing on Thursday.

entry.title: GameStop Stock Rising as Roaring Kitty YouTube Channel Mysteriously Updated
entry.summary: Shares in GameStop (GME) are climbing again Thursday amid speculation that influencer Roaring Kitty is returning to livestreams.

entry.title: Franklin Templeton Eyeing New Crypto Fund After Ethereum ETF Approval: Report
entry.summary: The fund would cater to institutional investors and focus on altcoins, according to a report—and could offer staking rewards.

entry.title: F1 Team McLaren Reveals Free Ethereum NFTs With OKX
entry.summary: McLaren and F1 team sponsor OKX are launching free NFTs on the Ethereum network X Layer with potential VIP prizes up for grabs.

entry.title: ‘Let’s Push Boundaries’: NFC Summit Takes in Awards, AI and ‘Post-Human Modernism’
entry.summary: The third edition of the Non-Fungible Conference in Lisbon celebrated NFTs, Bitcoin Ordinals, AI filmmaking and meme coins.

entry.title: Ethereum Network Ronin Launches ‘Forge’ Program to Onboard More Games
entry.summary: The network behind Pixels and Axie Infinity is starting to open up to more studios and games. Here’s what Ronin Forge has in store.

entry.title: ‘Xociety’ Developer Raises $7.5 Million to Launch Sui Shooter Game
entry.summary: Vibrant third-person shooter game Xociety is gearing up to launch on Sui later this year after raising some fresh funding.

entry.title: Binance Coin BNB Sets All-Time High as Chain Volume Soars
entry.summary: BNB Chain’s total value locked has increased by $460 million in the past 30 days.

entry.title: Robinhood Acquires Crypto Exchange Bitstamp in $200 Million Deal
entry.summary: The $200 million cash deal is expected to close in the first half of 2025, subject to regulatory approvals.

entry.title: 'Bitcoin Jesus' Roger Ver Released on Bail in Spain
entry.summary: The Bitcoin early adopter and Bitcoin Cash evangelist faces extradition to the U.S. on charges of evading taxes to the tune of $48 million.

entry.title: Riot Stock Shrugs Off Short Seller's 'War Against Bitcoin Miners'
entry.summary: "Bitcoin mining is one of the stupidest business models we've come across in our time short selling," the Kerrisdale CIO said yesterday.

entry.title: Warped Games Embraces Premature Teaser Release to Highlight "Warped Universe"
entry.summary: Delaware, United States, 6th June 2024, GamingWire

entry.title: Webinar: Unleashing The Power Of Permissionless Markets With Vega Protocol
entry.summary: Join our expert panel for an insightful discussion on Vega Protocol's revolutionary approach to decentralized derivatives trading. Discover how Vega's permissionless markets enable anyone to create and trade futures and perpetuals on a fully decentralized network. Explore the potential of Vega's innovative features, such as the ability to add new assets, transfer network assets, and adjust network parameters—as well as the protocol's active markets.

entry.title: Former OpenAI Safety Researcher Says ‘Security Was Not Prioritized’
entry.summary: Leopold Aschenbrenner joins a growing chorus of former and current OpenAI employees that say CEO Sam Altman is leaving responsible AI development behind in his pursuit of profit.

entry.title: This iPhone Challenger Could Transform Smartphones by Trading Apps for AI
entry.summary: The next high-end smartphone from British electronics maker Nothing will make AI everything, including a personalized AI companion that feels “almost like a best friend.”

entry.title: Nvidia Flips Apple As Stock Hits $3 Trillion Market Cap Amid AI Boom
entry.summary: With NVDA stock flying high, investors have good reason to cheer—including Nancy Pelosi.

entry.title: Bitcoin Users Just Wasted $100K on Invalid Rune Mints
entry.summary: $97,662 in BTC evaporated as late transactions killed attempts at minting on the Rune Protocol.

entry.title: Ethereum Price to Hit $22,000 by 2030, Predicts VanEck
entry.summary: The firm’s spot Bitcoin ETF has pulled in $513 million so far, and it foresees a bright future for Ethereum, too.

entry.title: Ethereum Devs Shut Down Linea—Can Layer-2 Networks Be Trusted?
entry.summary: Layer-2s have been sold as Ethereum’s future—but are they actually decentralized? Linea's weekend crisis raises tough questions.

entry.title: ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Cipher Guide: How to Use Morse Code to Earn a Million Free Coins in the Telegram Game
entry.summary: Now there’s another way to rack up free coins ahead of the Hamster Kombat airdrop. Here’s how to do it and where to find the latest code.

entry.title: GameStop Pumps 16% as SEC Chair Gensler Sidesteps Roaring Kitty Question
entry.summary: Keith Gill’s trading activity and social media posts are reportedly being scrutinized by federal and state regulators.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Rises After Bank of Canada Cuts Interest Rate Below 5%
entry.summary: Canada is the first G7 nation to pull back on inflation controls, with the European Union likely next in line.

entry.title: Gary Gensler Is Now Being Asked About Bonk ETFs Following Ethereum Approvals
entry.summary: SEC Chair Gary Gensler took a less hostile approach to crypto in a new interview following Ethereum ETF approvals—and was asked what's next.

entry.title: Ethereum Creator Vitalik Buterin Explains What Celebrity Tokens Get Wrong
entry.summary: The crypto veteran railed against star-studded token cash grabs, saying the hype can be harnessed for good.

entry.title: Jil Sander, Maison Margiela, and Marni Fashion Brands Adopt On-Chain Authentication
entry.summary: Parent company OTB has announced plans to use Aura’s NFC chip-based blockchain model for digital certificates of authenticity.

entry.title: Another Wave of Bitcoin ETF Adoption Is Coming: Franklin Templeton CEO
entry.summary: Jenny Johnson says institutions are still in a “wait and see” mode with Bitcoin ETFs, meaning there’s a lot more sidelined capital waiting to pour in.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 131 - BIG BITCOIN INFLOWS!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see large $900M inflows, biggest in weeks. $800M of shorts would be liquidated above $72K. BTC to $100K if it breaks $73K in a week: Novogratz. BNB hits new ATH, breaks $100B market cap. FTX reaches $200M tax settlement with IRS. Most investors should hold BTC: Fidelity. Tether CEO criticises EU on stablecoin regulation. Japanese exchange raises $320M to recover funds. ETH ETFs could see $4B inflows in 5 months: K33. Paradigm propose MEV taxes. StarkWare plans ZK scaling for BTC.

entry.title: Lawmakers Seek to Skirt Biden’s Anti-Crypto Veto, Tighten SEC’s Purse
entry.summary: A bill that provides the SEC with less funds for the coming fiscal year also prohibits the agency from implementing or enforcing SAB 121.

entry.title: Coinbase Debuts Smart Wallet, Gunning to Bring 1 Billion Users to Crypto
entry.summary: Promising simple setup and gasless transactions, the self-custody wallets is designed to work across networks and apps.

entry.title: Ethereum Wallet MetaMask Now Lets You Launch Crypto Games—Here’s How
entry.summary: MetaMask Portfolio now includes a native blockchain games directory powered by HyperPlay, letting you find and play games from the interface.

entry.title: Donald Trump's Crypto Stash Reaches $30 Million Because People Keep Sending Him Meme Coins
entry.summary: Donald Trump's crypto wallet has swelled to a $30 million after the Trog (Trump Frog) team airdropped him half the meme coin's supply.

entry.title: Ethereum Gaming Network Xai Launches Bootcamp to Bring Web2 Devs Into Crypto
entry.summary: The Xai Foundation’s team-up with Outlier Ventures is designed to help game creators make the leap into the blockchain world.

entry.title: Nibiru to ‘Overcome Ethereum’s Limitations’ With High-Speed Parallel EVM
entry.summary: Publicly released for alpha testing on May 28, Nibiru EVM is slated for mainnet launch in the second half of 2024.

entry.title: U.S. Lawmakers Urge Biden to Rescue 'Hostage' Binance Exec From Detention in Nigeria
entry.summary: House members urged "immediate action" in the case of Binance exec Tigran Gambaryan, arguing that his "health and well-being are in danger."

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 130 - $DOG TARGETS 1B MC
entry.summary: Runes & Ordinals soar as DOG passes $900M. rekt Brands opens up its shares claim for NFT holders. BTC led NFT trading volume with $6.3M on the day. NodeMonkes +10% 0.289, Puppets +35% at 0.198. Runes up by DOG which soared 23% to $922M mc. BUS won the Blast Jackpot last night for a 3% win. Memecoin majors are mostly red this AM. Trader buys 10k SOL of GME. Base brings back Onchain Summer. Dapper settles massive lawsuit.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 129 - ROARING RETURNS, AGAIN!
entry.summary: Crypto bounces, BTC breaks 2-week downtrend. BTC low volatility points to trend continuation. BTC will top at $150k in September 2025: Brandt. $3bn ETH withdrawn from exchanges since ETF. ETH ETF inflows imply ‘base case’ price $5.3k. ETH ETF inflows won’t be like BTC: Fireblocks. BTC logo projected on ECB building. Ethena USDe hits $3bn market cap in 4 months. Maple launches DeFi institutional lending platform. OKX launches in the Netherlands. Matter Labs drops ZK ticker. Linea shuts down chain after hack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 128 - PUMP DOT FUN KEEPS PUMPING!
entry.summary: Crypto nears break-out then falls on Trump verdict. 13 straight days of BTC ETF inflows, BTC whale accumulation ‘echoes 2020’. Crypto apps next year will onboard millions: Burniske. Elon denies talking crypto policy with Trump. RFK has bought 21 BTC during campaign. TON market cap falls after updating supply data. a16z donates $25m to crypto PAC. Vitalik sends 30ETH to Tornado devs. DBS Bank in Singapore custodies $650m ETH. Backlash grows over zkSync using ZK ticker. Implementing FIT21 a slow process: CFTC. Pierce recommends UK & US cross-border sandbox. Vitalik writes blog on block size wars. Hong Kong government expresses support for web3. Do Kwon & Terraform reach settlement with SEC. Large unlocks for a number of alts next month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 127 - CELEB COINS CRASH!
entry.summary: NYSE to launch BTC options. CME has ‘no plans’ to offer SOL futures. Stablecoin market cap rises to 2 year high. Inflation below 3.3% ‘means BTC ATH’. Crypto market cap heading to $200T: Yat Siu. Gemini recovers $2.2bn for Earn users. PayPal stablecoin will offer ‘confidential transfers’. Mastercard launches Crypto Credential pilot on BTC. Layer Zero launches on SOL. L2s are cultural extensions of ETH: Vitalik. FTX’s Salame says he will share story. SEI announces 27m SEI airdrop. ASI merger complete, to launch June 13th.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 126 - MEMECOIN MADNESS!
entry.summary: BlackRock ETF flips Grayscale in size. BTC ETFs see 11 straight days of inflows. ZKasino gives 72hours for ETH withdrawals. ENS to migrate to L2. ADA drops out of top 10 coins. Salame sentenced to 7.5 years in jail. Riot Platforms attempts takeover of Bitfarms. Ripple donates $25m to Fairshake PAC. Pump(.)fun launches live streaming. Iggy Azelea MOTHER coin leads celeb tokens. Beeple Everyday features many coins. Runes bounce, DOG hits $560m. PEPE active wallets double during rally. Cristiano Ronaldo launches 4th NFT. Friend Tech announces club wars.

entry.title: Ethereum DN-404 Tokens Are a Sensation in Asia. Are They the West’s Next Big Trend?
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and Rug Radio creator Pukerainbow sat down for a conversation with some of the biggest adopters involved in Ethereum’s newest trend: dividing NFTs.

entry.title: Buying Crypto Simplified with Mika
entry.summary: In the first part of our series turning crypto beginners into crypto pros, Rug Radio creator Mika guides you through the process of purchasing cryptocurrency using crypto exchange Kraken.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 125 - ETH NEARS 4K
entry.summary: ETH leads rally on continued bullish ETF sentiment. Previous anti-crypto Trump comments highlighted. Wave of influencers and celebrities hacked, release coins. Phantom becomes no.1 finance app in the US. Argentina & El Salvador hold talks on BTC adoption. LINK to have large announcement on May 30th. PEPE, MOG, TURBO, TRUMP hit ATHs in ETH memes. MOG up 60%, mentioned in Beeple Everyday. Caitlyn Jenner hacker releases JENNER coin. Garga outlines future plans for BAYC. Friend Tech founder offers $200k to migrate off Base.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 124 - THE ETH ETF IS APPROVED!
entry.summary: ETH ETFs get approved 19b-4 forms. ETFs won’t trade until July or August: Galaxy. ETF means many coins not securities: Coinbase CLO. Coinbase relists XRP in US. SOL ETF coming: Scaramucci. US House passes vote to ban CBDC. Building a pro-crypto army in congress: Sen. Lummis. Polymarket backlash over if ETH ETF truly approved. Expect ETH ETFs to be 10-15% of BTC: Bloomberg. BTC ETFs see $1.75bn inflows over 9 days. BTC to $150k in 2024 is base case: Tom Lee. ETH co-founder moves $37m ETH to exchanges. Grayscale launches trusts for STX & NEAR. Coinbase loses against SEC on DOGE sweepstakes. ALGO ad attacks BTC, SOL, ETH. Phantom now no.2 finance App on Google Play.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 123 - ETHEREUM KEEPS GOING!
entry.summary: ETH soars, ETF S1 approvals expected in hours. US house greenlights FIT21 bill with broad support. Gensler says SEC already has rules for crypto. Hong Kong set to allow ETH staking for ETFs. ETH OI continues to soar. SOL mentioned as next ETF candidate on CNBC. SOL ETF will take years: Bloomberg. MetaMask plans BTC integration. Fed says only 7% of Americans own crypto. SBF heads to a new prison. Hong Kong orders WLD shutdown. TON added to Binance ahead of potential listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 122 - ETH ETF MOVES CLOSER!
entry.summary: ETH ETFs move closer to approval, drop staking. Blackrock ETF see biggest inflow in 6 weeks. Grayscale ETH discount narrows under 10%. BTC & ETH heading for ATH: StanChart. Banana zone squared coming for ETH: Raoul Pal. Trump accepts crypto donations including DOGE. Pelosi mulls support of crypto bill. Farcaster raises $150M, DEGEN up 20%. Coinbase to launch gold & oil futures trading. Uniswap ‘ready to fight’ against SEC. Vitalik proposes solutions to MEV problems. Phantom may soon support email sign-up. Jupiter announces initiative to tokenise RWAs.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 121 - ETHEREUM GOD CANDLES!
entry.summary: ETH ETF suddenly seems likely, flurry of amendments. ETH biggest daily gain ever, gains SOL market cap. ETF approval shifted due to political pressure. ETF approval may come as soon as tomorrow. Squeeze liquidates $230M of shorts. ETH OI hits record of $14B on exchanges. BTC nears ATH amid 6th straight day of ETF inflows. SOL flips ETH in Google search trends. House Democrats will not whip against crypto bills. Anti-crypto FDIC chair Gruenberg to step-down. Grayscale CEO steps down, ETHE discount narrows. Genesis settles for $2B with creditors. Binance to focus launchpad on higher float projects. SEI v2 launch coming next week.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Chikai
entry.summary: In this week’s episode, we sit down with our good friend and one of the biggest supporters of the pod, Chikai Ohazama. Chikai is the co-founder of Keyhole which was acquired by Google and became Google Earth. He is one of the most caring art collectors in our space, as well as an extremely talented AI artist.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 120 - SOLANA LEADS THE CHARGE
entry.summary: SOL again leads majors, DEX volume dwarfs others. BTC whales buys $106M in 24hrs. ETH ETF decision on Thursday or Friday. 5 of 7 onchain indicators ‘point to bull-run’. ETH ETF may be rejected due to weak link to futures. AI coins in focus ahead of Nvidia earnings. Cobie inks new article on low float, high FDV coins. ETH foundation staff reveal links to EigenLayer. 12 L2 & L3s controlled by single multisig. Layer Zero pauses sybil rewards. Aevo to airdrop pre-launch tokens on platform. FTM to migrate one-to-one to Sonic S coin. UK judge rules Craig Wright is not Satoshi.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 119 - GOOD MORNING BULLS!
entry.summary: SOL leads majors higher again, BTC stable. ETFs see $257M inflow, volumes hit 2 month high. 414 holders of BlackRock ETF ‘blows away record’. SOL continues to be fastest blockage despite usage. Pump. fun exploited for $1.9M by ex-employee. LINK up 20% after partnership with top banks. Senate also repeals SEC crypto rule. US Senator uses laser eyes PFP. Tether mints another $1B USDT. Bitcoin production costs now $45K: JP Morgan. Pink Drainer retires after stealing $85m assets. PancakeSwap to reimburse fees on Uniswap. TON & Tether partnership on payment solution. Trabucco writes character defence of Ryan Salame.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 118 - ARE THE ETFS BACK?
entry.summary: Bitcoin has best day in 2 months after dovish CPI. ETFs see $300M inflow, highest in weeks. ETH continues to underperform ahead of ETF ruling. Millennium buys $2B of BTC ETF. CME group to launch BTC spot trading. Fed’s Kashkari compares BTC to beanie babies. Tate says he will buy $100M BTC. El Salvador now owns 5750 BTC. Binance creates ‘antidote’ to address poisoning. Tornado Cash developer appeals conviction. China busts $1.9B USDT banking racket. MEV bot operators charged with fraud by DoJ. Swiss to adopt global crypto tax rules. FTX repayments create ‘bullish overhang’ for crypto. SEI up 30% after proposing v2 upgrade.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 117 - BITCOIN GAINS ON CPI
entry.summary: BTC bounces driven by spot buying. US ETF sees $100M+ inflow for first time in weeks. State of Wisconsin buys $170M of BTC ETF. Vanguard appoints Bitcoin friendly CEO. Coinbase sees billions of BTC leave exchange. BTC to consolidate between $55-75K: Novogratz. SOL beats ETH TEV for first time ever. ETH may be labelled a security by SEC next week. AI & memes the only two positive sectors this week. Crypto hostility led by TradFi: Lubin. Tornado Cash developer guilty of money laundering. Circle shifts legal hope to US ahead of IPO. Cypher developer gambled $300K of customer funds.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 116 - ROARING KITTY RETURNS!
entry.summary: Crypto falls, stays in range ahead of CPI tomorrow. US ETFs see small net inflow led by Fidelity HK ETFs wipe 2 weeks of inflows in a single day. Bracebridge bought $363m of BTC ETFs. Coinbase has system wide outage. Poloniex hacker sends funds to Tornado Cash. Brazil biggest in LATAM for crypto trading. Biden removes China BTC miner near military base. CertiK patches $5m flaw in Aptos bridge. LayerZero sees 100k bot accounts self-report. DYDX CEO set to leave. Tate sells $500k BTC to buy GME.
